attributes.action: Build a new Ice Centre in Manchester. Ice Rink
attributes.additional_details: Manchester has always had a good Ice hockey team but we have got one of the worst ice rinks in the country.  So we are petitioning to get a new ice rink built in the Manchester. Ice Skating and ice hockey is an amazing sport for kids to get into. Ice hockey is definitely on the rise in the UK so we feel that Manchester should have a good facility, also for people of the general public to come and enjoy ice skating.
attributes.background: Build a new ice Centre in Manchester for people to come and learn how to skate play ice hockey and also enjoy watching professional ice hockey.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
